text: Va ʙa [suji qavmi] Samud ʙarodarason Soleh ro [firistodem] U guft: «Ej qavmi man, Alloh taoloro ʙiparasted, ki cuz U ma'ʙud [-i ʙarhaq] nadored. Be tardid, daleli ravsane az [suji] Parvardigoraton ʙaroi sumo omadaast. In modasuturi Alloh taolo [ki az dili saxraho ʙerun omadaast] ʙarojaton mu'cizaest, pas, uro [ʙa holi xud] voguzored, to dar zamini Alloh taolo [ʙicarad va alaf] ʙixurad va ʙa u ozor [-u oseʙe] narasoned, ki sumoro azoʙi dardnoke faro xohad girift
